comment.content:
It is not meant for companies and companies who regularly talk to customers on twitter will definitely turn this feature off. So you will likely still be able to talk with any company that wants to talk with its customers on twitter. 

It is meant for regular folks who get lot of unsolicited spam in their inboxes. It puts an immediate stop to those. So in that sense, it’s a tricky but good move.

comment.content:
If you look in to the court case, he was 100% going to be forced to buy it. There was a penalty fee for backing out but it didn't apply

post.embed_description: Elon Musk just turned your DMs into an ad for Twitter Blue. But you can change it back. Here's how.

community.name: technology
community.title: Technology
community.description:
Its a new technology community. Bring the content. ALL the content! 

Rules:
1. Follow the [lemmy.world rules.](https://mastodon.world/about) 
2. Mostly tech related content.
3. Be most [excellent to each another!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rph_1DODXDU)

Together we can create an awesome place for technology discussion and articles.

comment.content: Yes, yes fucking exactly, how is it not an automatic gold mine!? This vexes me as well.
